scripts.db:prepare-migration: prisma generate && prisma migrate dev --create-only --skip-seed && tsx src/post-migration.ts
scripts.db:prepare-migration:staging: dotenv -e ../../.env.staging -- prisma generate && prisma migrate dev --create-only --skip-seed && tsx src/post-migration.ts
scripts.db:deploy-migration:staging: dotenv -e ../../.env.staging -- prisma migrate deploy && prisma generate
scripts.db:deploy-migration:production: dotenv -e ../../.env.production -- prisma migrate deploy && prisma generate
